mapper.select: SELECT ba.id, ba.item_id, i.name AS itemName, ba.user_id, u.real_name AS username, ba.expected_borrow_time AS startTime, ba.expected_return_time AS endTime, ba.status, ba.apply_time, ba.update_time AS audit_time, ba.reject_reason FROM borrow_apply ba LEFT JOIN item i ON ba.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN user u ON ba.user_id = u.id WHERE ba.id = #{applyId}
